name: Casino Clash
description:
Welcome to Casino Clash, in which a society where the lower your chances for landing on one side, the higher your worth.

Being a coin is the worst possible life in this world. 50%? HA. Used, thrown around, and carelessly dropped, FiftyFifty is sick of his lot in life. This casino chip is on a mission to take down those haughty dice

CONTROLS:

WASD: Movement

Left-click: Attack

Right-click: Dodge-roll

Made with love and pain by:

Sid - Environment, Characters & Anim

Zebulah- Programming, SFX

Scub3d - Programming

ardaxalev - Music

BrightSpark117 - Character Concepts
